ing: 1 (8 ounce) bottle zesty Italian-style salad dressing
des: "Great vegetable-bean dip for any party or appetizer event. Serve with scoop chips or any tortilla chip you like. Enjoy!"
ins: Mix yellow hominy, white hominy, black-eyed peas, onion, red bell pepper, tomato, and garlic together in a bowl. Stir Italian-style dressing into the mixture. Allow to marinate in refrigerator for 3 hours.
